content: That's a great idea! Walking outside is a simple but effective way to get some fresh air and enjoy the benefits of being in nature. Just remember to take it slow, enjoy the scenery, and focus on deep breathing and relaxation. It's very natural to feel anxious at first, but with time, patience, and consistency, you may find that outdoor activities like walking become an integral part of your mental health self-care routine. Best of luck, and I hope you find some peace and relaxation in your outdoor activities!
